reporting_cycle: Secretary-General reports no later than 1 February 2007
summary:
12. Requests the Secretary-General to keep the Council informed of developments, including preparations for the 2007 elections and UNMIT's mandate implementation, and submit a report by 1 February 2007.

13. Requests the Secretary-General to ensure UNMIT's compliance with the zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse, and to keep the Council informed.

14. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
